The latest version of our easy-to-use SmartNas app! 
Freshly updated with a variety of bug fixes plus the introduction of Smart StreamOn – our new plan with a huge data bonus just for streaming plus FREE subscriptions to iflix and JaiKonTV!

The latest version of SmartNas.
Updated with a variety of bug fixes plus the introduction of Smart ThomMorng! – our best value deal where 1 USD = 333 USD in calls, data and SMS.

We recently launched Smart @Home, our brand-new home WiFi service! With our latest SmartNas update, you can book delivery of a Smart @Home router directly to your home. One of our Smart agents will drop by at a time convenient to you and set up your router for you! Bookings are now open in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Battambang. Enjoy!

Welcome to the newly updated SmartNas - a self-care app that lets you control and manage your balance, subscribe to services, top up and get more done anytime, anywhere. SmartNas works when you are connected to the Internet. This update includes a complete redevelopment of existing features, with a faster and smoother experience.

Welcome to the newly updated SmartNas - our self-care app that lets you control and manage your balance, subscribe to services, top up and get more done anytime, anywhere.  
What’s new 
We’re super excited to release a new section for Smart @Home, our new home WiFi service! You can browse through the different packages, top up and manage your entire account – all from your phone.   
 
We’ve spruced up the home screen with a fresh new look and introduced a simpler, one-time password login to make using the app quicker and simpler. Accessing the latest news is also much easier, thanks to a little red dot notification that appears every time new content is available.  
 
If that’s not enough, we’ve fixed a variety of small bugs and glitches, so the app is even more effortless to use. Of course, if we’ve missed anything, simply drop us a message on Facebook and we’ll fix it as soon as possible. Enjoy!

Thanks for using SmartNas! This release brings bug fixes that improve your user experience. We're always making changes and improvements to SmartNas. To make sure you don't miss a thing, just keep your updates turned on.

We’ve added a variety of new services, including iflix and Soyo, and revamped the plans and services section for a more vibrant look. SmartNas now works great on iPad, plus we've introduced push notifications to keep you better informed of updates and news. We’ve also done a range of bug fixes for a smoother experience. Enjoy!

We recently launched Smart @Home, our brand-new home WiFi service! With our latest SmartNas update, you can book delivery of a Smart @Home router directly to your home. One of our Smart agents will drop by at a time convenient to you and set up your router for you! Bookings are now open in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Battambang. Enjoy!

We’ve added some cool new features to make SmartNas easier and faster to use. You can now top up from your phone quickly and securely using a bank card. Plus we've fixed a variety of bugs and optimized the layout for iPhone X and iPad. Enjoy!

Our latest release introduces a cool new Chinese-language option. We’ve also updated the Smart @Home section, which is now better and easier to use as you can now change your plan within the app. Enjoy!
Our latest release makes it easier to subscribe to Smart Tunes via the SmartNas app. We've also addressed some minor bugs and fixes. Enjoy!
With our latest SmartNas version release, you can easily check your outstanding SmartLoan and Loan history! Simply click on the SmartLoan button in SmartNas. Enjoy!
With our latest SmartNas release, you can now easily get a SmartLoan directly through the app! We’ve also fixed a variety of bugs so the app is faster, smoother and easier to use. Enjoy!

With our latest SmartNas release, you can now easily use SmartLuy to pay right after you make your SmartVIP redemption. We've also made the Smart @Home top up process more intuitive. This release comes also with bug fixes that improve your user experience. Enjoy!
With our latest SmartNas release comes with bug fixes that improve your app performance and user experience. Enjoy!

With our latest SmartNas release, you can now check your SmartPay history for any purchase on App Store. This release comes also with bug fixes that improve your app performance and user experience. Enjoy!
